subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Brady passed for a team-record 517 yards and 4 touchdowns, including a 99-yarder to Wes Welker, and the visiting Patriots beat the Miami Dolphins, 38-24, on Monday night.
snippet: Brady passed for a team-record 517 yards and 4 touchdowns, including a 99-yarder to Wes Welker, and the visiting Patriots beat the Miami Dolphins, 38-24, on Monday night.
